metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6605 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: mediaserver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows attackers to cause adenial of service (process crash) via unspecified vectors, aka internalbugs 20915134 and 23142203, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-7718.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
